document_data.name: Fist Repossessions
document_data.mainbody: '''Fist Repossessions''' was a collection agency from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], [[Pammella Nortale]] of [[Nortale's Hostel]] fell behind on paying for deliveries from [[Durinbold & Oathoon]]. [[Martnev Oathoon]], Valued Customer Disciplinarian, mailed Pammella a notice that unless she made a minimum payment for the previous month's shipment, she would be turned over to Fist Repossessions, despite the hostel being a non-profit.
